paragraphs.body: Born in Toronto, Ontario, Samonas moved to Coral Springs, Florida, with his family when he was eleven. There he did print modeling and became involved in theater. He currently resides in Los Angeles, California.
paragraphs.text: Born in Toronto, Ontario, Samonas moved to Coral Springs, Florida, with his family when he was eleven. There he did print modeling and became involved in theater. He currently resides in Los Angeles, California.

paragraphs.body: After moving to Florida when he was eleven, Samonas became involved in print modeling and local theater. His first lead role was in Ephraim, after which he served in several more films until his first television spot in Everybody Hates Chris. He returned to film and, in 2006, was cast in the ABC pilot Enemies. This was followed by appearances in Hannah Montana as Josh, Zoey 101, and repeated appearances as the voice of Teo in Avatar: The Last Airbender. In 2006 he was cast as Meat in The Last Day of Summer. In 2008, Samonas made an appearance on iCarly as Freddie's fencing rival Doug Toder and later appeared on Disney Channel's Wizards of Waverly Place as Alex's boyfriend Dean.

His first lead role was in Ephraim, after which he served in several more films until his first television spot in Everybody Hates Chris. He returned to film and, in 2006, was cast in the ABC pilot Enemies. This was followed by appearances in Hannah Montana as Josh, Zoey 101, and repeated appearances as the voice of Teo in Avatar: The Last Airbender. In 2006 he was cast as Meat in The Last Day of Summer. In 2008, Samonas made an appearance on iCarly as Freddie's fencing rival Doug Toder and later appeared on Disney Channel's Wizards of Waverly Place as Alex's boyfriend Dean.
